website_summaries.verdict: An inflatable cushion that will help with your stability and balance and holds up well under a lot of weight.
pros: Durable rubber cushion that won't crack or puncture
Suitable for use as a seat cushion
Won't deflate under a lot of weight
cons: The product doesn't come with any instructions on how much air to put into the cushion

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description of size
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly 12.75" even though Amazon description and box says 14". Other than that, ok.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped me out when I had bulging disks and it was hard for me to sit. Would definitely recommend for this. I gave it to my grandson to use as he has some issues in staying sitting still while doing school work. It is working wonders for him. He uses it almost all of the time while he is sitting. Thanks for the awesome product. Would highly recommend it for kids that have issues sitting still reading and or doing school work.
customer_reviews.author: nanak51

customer_reviews.title: Permanent dent
customer_reviews.text: Holds air well but like several others have said, I ordered the blue and it has a HUGE indent on the side from the way it was packaged, I believe. I over inflated it in the hopes that it would press out the dent but after 2 months it is still there. Unfortunately I'm now past return date so for anyone else ordering if you do receive one with the "dent" when inflated, return it immediately because it will not go away with use.
customer_reviews.author: LN6

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised by the poor reviews. I love this wobble cushion
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by the poor reviews. I love this wobble cushion! I use it on my chair at work and not only does it help me sit up straighter, but it definitely helps with my core. It was packaged well, came inflated (but also has a pump). No complaints. I would definitely recommend (and actually, already have recommended to several folks).
customer_reviews.author: Loved By Many

customer_reviews.title: I bought this cushion to place it on the chair and it's perfect for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for work (OneSpace 60-101405 Computer Task Chair with Tractor Seat, Black  and the top was very hard, specially after sitting for several hours. I bought this cushion to place it on the chair and it's perfect for it. Not only that it made the chair comfortable but it helps me move my hips and work on my core at the same time. I am not stiff at the end of the day and I have better posture.
customer_reviews.author: Tn buyer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Every child in my music Studio wants to either sit on this wobble seat, or put their feet on it. I have a little girl who likes to sit on it to do homework or eat supper. Every child who comes into my house ends up sitting on this seat, whether they naturally "fidget" or not. It seems to be the perfect amount of body stimulation so that they can focus their minds on the task at hand. This is one of the best purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: wildeflower

customer_reviews.title: If you have knee/ankle issues: don't think about comparing to others, just buy this one; Update 1 year: Still GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product: works well for stability. I bought a different inferior product that was similarly priced below (don't buy the below product): : Update: after 1 year of use, product still holds up; Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: guywhosewatchingthewatchmen

customer_reviews.title: Teacher: great for wiggly kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom. I have at least one wiggly child in every class. This is a great way for kids to wiggle while seated without disturbing others. Kids that tap, fidget, or compulsively walk around the room can really benefit from this product. Some of my kiddos even grab this when we sit on the floor. I like that there are 2 different textured sides, which is great for my kids with Autism or Sensory issues. I'm going to purchase more of these right before school starts with gift cards students gave me!
customer_reviews.author: Tall Red Head

customer_reviews.title: Wobble cushion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wobble cushion on the advise of my chiropractor. I do a series of counting to 100 for each of the following directions. 1 - moving my hips forward and backward, 2 - moving my hips side to side, 3 - moving my hips in a circle counterclockwise, 4 - moving my hips in a circle counterclockwise. It has really helped to keep the mobility and prevent discomfort as I age. 😀
customer_reviews.author: James Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a class set of these with a grant from my school after piloting a few last year. They are comfy and fun for most kids, but they really make a huge difference for some of my most vulnerable learners. The cushions give kids not only quiet, nondisruptive movement options, but also tactile stimulation. Through a shipping snafu with Amazon, I had some difficulty getting my delivery. Seller was extremely helpful in directing me to get assistance. When two of my set of 25 failed to inflate properly, seller was prompt and helpful in resolving the matter. Highly recommend both product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 different colors. One was great, the other horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, 1 blue and 1 pink. The pink one is great, and the blue one has a really strange indent that I cannot get rid of. As soon as I filled it with air, the indent happened, and nothing seems to help. I could fill it way up, but then it's practically a round ball!
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Bought for an SPD kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for gifts for kids who have sensory processing issues. They love them. helps balance their body and brain. Noticed calmer after engaging in hyped up activities and helps balance the brain to allow speech to flow. Pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: Cam Sweitz

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping my daughter focused in class!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended at by my daughter's teacher, it has helped improve her focus in class tremendously! I would never have guess such a simple solution would yield such amazing results! Her grades have improved as a result as well. She has no diagnosed disorders but is just a rambunctious 9 year old who would much rather be digging in the dirt then sitting in class. (She has wonderful teachers!)
customer_reviews.author: Car Star

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with how sturdy the material is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for the at-home portion of my 13 lb Shih Tzu's canine rehab therapy. It has worked really well for helping strengthen her back legs and hips. I have ended up using it quite a bit myself to work on strengthening my back and my core. I was pleased with how sturdy the material is, because there are sharp little dog toes on it every day.
customer_reviews.author: SP11

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I searched and tried to read the reviews on a lot of these because there were so many similar ones, but I still ended up getting a pretty uncomfortable cushion. I got this for work but it seems to have given me back pain I didn't have before. I also thought it may help with my posture but instead I end up sitting in weird positions trying to get conformable. I wanted to like this but sadly I cant say that I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jamika

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because I thought she would like to sit on it because she is always sitting on the floor anyway. She liked it all right and uses it from time to time although I have a sinking suspicion that maybe my idea for a gift wasn't received as well as I thought. It's not like I was saying you need to tone your core or anything I was just trying to be thoughtful . Anyway it's quality go ahead and buy it
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gerald

customer_reviews.title: My trainer recommended this, and showed me a progression of use
customer_reviews.text: Balance, strength and flexibility of ankle tissues are really one comprehensive issue. This cushion addresses all. My trainer recommended this, and showed me a progression of use, similar to increasing weight or reps in weight resistance exercise. 1. Arms out; 2. arms out / eyes closed; 3. arms folded to torso / eyes open; 4. arms folded / eyes closed; 5. same progression but add partial squat; 6. increase squat depth. This progression can be extended indefinitely, with appreciable gains in balance and strength and flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great for ADHD or wiggly kids
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old has ADHD and his teacher purchased a few of these last year for the kids to try in her class. The popularity of them was overwhelming with the kids begging to have the cushion each day. My son says that sitting on the cushion helps him to focus better and 'get his wiggles out'. I asked this year if his teacher would allow him to have his own and he agreed. So he now has his own and all the other kids want one! Highly recommend for kids with ADHD in particular.
customer_reviews.author: momoftwinz

customer_reviews.title: Not useful...go for a foam square
customer_reviews.text: Wobbles to much even at high inflation... the issue is for a foot to stand on it when it's highly inflated it becomes rounded it on top and that's not enough surface area to stand on... I much prefer using the foam style square ...yes it is double the price but it's the right thing for the job... these circles really don't work... I wish I had seen that the therapists have a stack of these that really never get use they only use the foam one... and the foam it looks really dog eared because it's what all the therapists reach for...
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Marty

customer_reviews.title: He liked a wooden balance board that I bought him last ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son who has balance issues due to loss of hearing in one ear and general clumsiness. He is also a high functioning autistic (Asperger's). He liked a wooden balance board that I bought him last year. I always thought it was kind of dangerous on our tile floor... This is perfect for standing or sitting. I even use it a lot. I stand while I work because I don't get the chance to exercise a lot. Now I stand on this and work for about an hour a day. It is great to help with core muscles and keep good posture and good balance.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: A great product for the classroom and at home
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! I bought one to try out in my classroom with my first graders. It gives them a seating option, helps with the wiggles, and helps to keep them from tilting their chairs on two legs. After the first one worked so well, I bought several more. They are a very reasonable price and really made a difference for my students. I also bought one for myself at home. It helps alleviate my lower back pains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for balance!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how bad my balance actually was until I used this. Using it for 2-3 min several times per day has increased my core strength which has greatly improved my balance. I stand on it and put my arms straight in front of me, or over my head.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Sitting on it is one thing, but standing on it I'd recommend against.
customer_reviews.text: I've read plenty of reviews about the merits of sitting on this. I got it to stand on for balance improvement...and it jacked up my ankle in a bad way. I'd recommend getting a balance board instead because this will potentially force your feet or ankles to position, or more accurately hyperextend, in an unfavorable way.
customer_reviews.author: M. Day

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a couple days ago and so far I love it. The two sides have different sized dimples to allow you to sit with comfort, or stand with traction. Easy to inflate/deflate, and small enough to be portable. Be careful not to over-inflate, as the rubber will just keep expanding. Very reasonable price for a product that is usable to get a workout no matter where you are or what you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hillis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The cushion seemed fine but BOTH needles of the pump broke immediately on first use
customer_reviews.author: Dewfather

customer_reviews.title: Good for stability training.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it to improve my stability on one foot. I have seen some improvement in only a week. It has stimulating knobs on other sides which supposedly help. So far they are uncomfortable but they do stimulate my feet.
customer_reviews.author: hooked

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I won't give low stars unless I'm absolutely positive the item is awful and it's not just me. In this case, it could be that my balance is just that bad. My physical therapist recommended one of these for balance and core. I can use the one in her office, but I cannot use this without holding onto something. It's way too squishy if you don't inflate enough and way too hard to balance if you inflate too much. Again, this could be me, but I do not have an issue with the one at my PT's office.
customer_reviews.author: Struxtastic

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It is small enough for home use. I use it to improve my balance as well as provide back support on a slouchy couch. The pump works fine. Seems to hold the air well also.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Still have to prove out
customer_reviews.text: The golf pro I take golf lessons from suggested I try these cushions as I tend to lean into a shot, brining my weight forward and when I do, I shank the shot which of course is disaster. I personally feel odd using these cushons but the trainer says they work to help develop proper balance and even the pros use them. I have begun practicing with these cushions, again, I am having trouble seeing how they will help in a practtical way, but I will continue using them. For sure staying balanced on the cushions is a challenge so hopefully if I master that it will fix my balance & shanking problems.
customer_reviews.author: richard m buchignani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Pump works well. This was recommended by my PT for ankle flexibility and balance work. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Helps for those who have to sit all day
customer_reviews.text: Sitting all day kills me...I stretch often during every day...This help take pressure off my spine while I sit...or I put it behind my lower back while sitting... It also helps under my feet while I'm using my stand-up desk...
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Working on my balance
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I want it to do. Having poor balance, my friend suggested that I get this. She gets on her knees with her arms out and stays balanced. I couldn't do that, but I do stand on it while I stand close to the counter. Rocking back and forth on my feet, I do feel my calves and ankles toning up. Lots of Youtube videos for help, too. The negative side of this product has to do with the air pump. There aren't any instructions on how much air should be in the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: So far indestructible for an autism household!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a sensory seat to add to my daughters desk chair. It has two different textured sides. One side being more textured than the other. She has enjoyed it and found it comforting to put it on the floor while she stands on it. It's been through a lot for the month that we've had it. Doesn't show any signs that it can't handle it. Very well made. Only had to inflate it the first day, has not lost any air since then.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wobble cushion
customer_reviews.text: We use it to put on the floor for his feet , he has sensory issues and it works great
customer_reviews.author: J. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for posture control while sitting on the couch
customer_reviews.text: Great for posture control while sitting on the couch, and, stability while standing - I need to hang on to door-jamb but am confident I am strengthening my ankles and feel I am less likely to stumble, I'm 86 and want to extend my independence.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lewy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for rehabbing ankle
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I broke my ankle and am currently rehabbing. This allowed me to inflate only as much as I wanted--making it more or less wobbly. I am able to use it for balancing and standing on the edges to stretch my ankle. It stays in place very nicely. Only drawback is the nubby side is too uncomfortable to stand on, so I use it with that side facing down.
customer_reviews.author: SKW

customer_reviews.title: I can already feel a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I have an inflamed sciatica nerve and my chiropractor recommended a wobble cushion for when I had to sit. It was easy to inflate and since sitting on it I already feel less pain. I would definitely recommend this to someone else with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sumicormi

customer_reviews.title: Saw some easy exercises with this cushion on youtube
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at a Chiropractor's office in Miami.. The place was a sham but these cushions were very different approach to passive sitting. Not sure if it has any real therapeutic value, but it does keep my back from tightening, so far. Saw some easy exercises with this cushion on youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Can Wait.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I used this in physical therapy and it didn't really help me all that much. I didn't like having to wear shoes, but it was painful to not wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my own (old-ish) tushie, which can get a bit sore even on upholstered furniture. And to help tone my core strength, I thought. Unfortunately, this cushion doesn't wobble at all on anything upholstered. It simply sinks into the padding, with no motion. And it's a bit hard for softening a hard chair. Since I bought and have it.... I use it sometimes at the dinner table. I imagine it has it's uses, as other reviewers have stated. Doesn't work for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great core work aid!
customer_reviews.text: My son has low muscle tone & poor balance so we use this in his physical therapy sessions to address those issues. He stands on it while working on a puzzle or tip toe on it while stretching to reach a toy barely in reach against a wall. He even gets on it without prompting through out the day while he stands at his tall desk to play or watch a video. The different sized nubs on the disc are great for his sensory needs also
customer_reviews.author: GabeOz

customer_reviews.title: Life is short. Play with your dog!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and an antiburst exercise ball at same time. My dog attacked and killed the ball and used the wobble cushion as a frisbee until I saved it from a similar fate. Then she tried to rescue it from me when I tried to use it in her presence. Next I tried exercising in the (pet free) guest room but gave in to the whines and quivering nose protruding under the door. Now we walk together and I work on my balance navigatlng the treacherous sidewalks in my beautiful old neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Quemado

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Terribly disappointed! If I could give 0 stars I would. The disc wouldn't inflate and the 2 needles sent with the defective pump almost broke when I was trying to air it up. I bought this for teaching my dogs body awareness and I couldn't even begin to use it. Don't waste your money! I'm already returning it.
customer_reviews.author: RxDr09

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to rehab from ACL surgery. I used another brand at PT but these seems to be just as good and less expensive. I bought two and we have challenges of who can stay the longest (kids too). It makes the long process of ACL recovery a little more fun. I also own a wiggle seat (the triangular shaped one) for my son. He doesn't use it much any more but I see how you could use this just as well for that purpose too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Evans

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it comes with a pump
customer_reviews.text: my wife hurt her coccyx and boy does that hurt when she sits, this helped HUGE we adjusted the fullness with the included pump and off she goes its the right size for all chairs, and easy to pack, travel with and take to those recitals, and gynastic classes once you get the fullness right you don't really change it, i use it, and for those that excercise with stability balls this is the bomb you can take to the office and do your exercises great product i do my back exercises on it and use when i sit at the computer, it won't be long till my wife won't let me use it
customer_reviews.author: nofeer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you sit all day!
customer_reviews.text: I sit at a computer most of the day and it was really starting to do a number on my back. I got this to help and it is amazing. It requires you to make tiny adjustments while you are sitting and after awhile you don't even notice you are doing it. It is not a replacement for geeting up on a regular basis, but it helps my back a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kennedy, MA, EdS

customer_reviews.title: Works great for balance training
customer_reviews.text: These two cushions work just fine. I am pleased with them. I had spine surgery and needed to work on my balance and leg/ankle strength. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I 100% LOVE this item!!
customer_reviews.text: I had.one.of these a while back. It got midplaced in a shuffling of 'stuff' so rather than opening the proverbial can of worms to find where I stashed it, and knowing how VALUABLE using this item is, I bought another one!THAT'S how valuabe.and USEFUL using this is! I LOVE IT! Great for balance and core training!
customer_reviews.author: Barbarah

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It does help develop improved balance with use.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I keep it near a walkway I pass often, and spend just a couple of minutes at a time stepping on the cushion. It makes a surprising difference in balance for a very little effort. For someone who does have balance problems, be sure to have a handhold nearby for security until you feel more confident.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: It wibbles AND wobbles.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on this one is much thicker than I expected it to be. Which is a pleasant surprise. The pump comes with a needle to inflate and deflate. It has a bumpy side and a bumpyer side which is uncomfortable as a cushion. I got it for knee rehab so this does not affect me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice sensory therapy item
customer_reviews.text: product very nice quality and pump really works well. great therapy item
customer_reviews.author: mae eperthener

customer_reviews.title: I really like it - I'm sitting on it right now as ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it - I'm sitting on it right now as I work at my computer. Too bad there were no instructions inside. Also, I wouldn't stand on it myself - get a rigid balance gizmo for standing work. But it's fun to sit on. Pump works just fine. I give it 4 out of 5 because of the lack of instructions or sample uses. Other than that, it's a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: IMNotU

customer_reviews.title: highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is exactly what I was looking for to improve balance and strengthen lower legs in prep to go backpacking. The supplied pump and needle worked great. The cushion holds air very well. Balancing on it by standing on one foot at a time works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Wobble Cushion helps with balance exercises and to get the wiggles out of youngsters.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for balance therapy -- I have weak ankles. It also is helpful to sit on it to relieve tension. I used in on a long distance car trip. My grandsons use it for sitting on and it helps reduce the wiggles. I can see where it might be helpful in student desks or hyper active kids to diffuse some of their movement energies.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Geitgey

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for our energetic 4-year old
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to us by our son's Pre-K teacher. He likes it and it helps him stay seated at the dining room table longer to sit through a meal. So far, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ambervb

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a great size for our 3 year old. We use the wobble cushion daily as a sensory tool for our son with sensory processing disorder. We have had it inflated for several months and have not had to add any air to it. We have tested this wobble cushion to easily accommodate up to 200lbs. I believe it could probably hold much more than that. This is made with high quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Terra M

customer_reviews.title: It is great for developing stability
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his ACL surgery recovery. I ended up using it later for my ankle injury. It is great for developing stability, balance, and coordination. Stays inflated and is a really nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sar C

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in my chair at work. My biggest mistake was putting tooo much air in at first, so it was too hard. Let some air out and it worked perfectly. Love having this at work. I love even more, the textured side. I will put it flat against my lower back sometimes and it feels so good. Great color too. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Life Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good on the ankle I broke to strengthen it
customer_reviews.author: Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Unable to fill air in the cushion - not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really bad product. I had to throw it away. I was just not able to pump air in the cushion. I asked several other people to try it thinking that I may be doing something wrong. And none of my friends could do it.
customer_reviews.author: Manish Parekhji

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my balancing issues. I stand on it at least 3 times a day for 8-10 minutes at a time and sit on it all day at work. It's easy to blow up. I'm even having my son (age 7) try it at home during dinner to see if he will sit still...if that works I'll be getting him another to take to school. I did wish it came with some instructions or suggested usage.
customer_reviews.author: EBeautySue

customer_reviews.title: great for extended driving
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my driver's seat to help me maintain stability and spine alignment in my car because my job requires that I drive often. I purchased it after a friend of mine had a similar one that her chiropractor recommended for the same reason. I have eliminated lower back pain and shoulder pain. For in the car I keep it what seems barely inflated, but is perfect for spine stability. Fantastic quality and I appreciate the little pump!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting! I am surprised how 'unbalanced' I am. ...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting! I am surprised how 'unbalanced' I am. Whether I use it for sitting, for 'balance' exercises or my grandchildren warm up for soccer or their dance classes, this comes in handy. It took a bit of practice to insert the needle correctly to get the air in or reduced, but it really was not a problem once I got it.
customer_reviews.author: B.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The box was open and the cushion was inflated??...but nothing appears to be wrong with it. I was able to inflate and then deflate it with no problems, so it’s good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: as a reward for good behavior (they get to sit on this on their ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought multiples of this product for myself as the school counselor as well as the Special Ed department. We use them in many ways, ie: to help a kiddo that fidgets, as a reward for good behavior (they get to sit on this on their chair), as something to touch when our kiddos with Autism need a sensory outlet, etc. They are extremely well made, come with a pump and needle to inflate them and are comfy to sit on-I tried one out myself!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia H Wood

customer_reviews.title: This is a rugged wobble cushion that should provide years of service!
customer_reviews.text: Despite several reviewers reporting difficulty with this device, it is as easy as a kick ball to get inflated. The hand pump is handier than I imagined. Using my air compressor might have put too much air in too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The students like the sensory input
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the disks. The first disk worked well. The second disk did not hold air, but the company replaced it without a problem. Our chairs have metal sides by the seat. The disk fits well and does not slip off. The students like the sensory input. One side has less texture than the other, but all children have chosen the "bumpy" side. I wish I could afford 30!
customer_reviews.author: The Grass Is Always Greener On The Other Side

customer_reviews.title: not convinced
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work. I can't say i notice a different in my abs or back strength and I've had it for at least 6 months if not more. Not convinced it does much of anything except give me a few more inches of height at my desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stability cushion
customer_reviews.text: Great stability cushion! I've been using now for a couple months and it has helped make 10+ hour days at work more enjoyable. I suffer from lower back pain, so being able to sit comfortably all day long make this product worth every penny. No issues yet with the air cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gochenaur

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: This was awkward to sit on for me. Did not work at I had hoped. I tried it at my desk and sewing table. Just not comfortable. My husband tried it and had the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Wobble Cushion!
customer_reviews.text: Great wobble cushion! This is the second one I have ordered. Originally it was to be for my grandson, but my daughter used it instead! She works from home and spends a lot of time in at chair in front of the computer. She says it helps her to keep moving!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy plastic, I use this at my standing desk
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy plastic, I use this at my standing desk, standing on it on and off for a few hours at a time and it works exactly as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a wiggle seat
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this to curb his fidgets in school. The price was great, and it's a nice quality seat.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Thank the Lord above for this product. Evil chair ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank the Lord above for this product. Evil chair people created the implement of torture that I was sitting on at my office. But....thanks to you, I can move my bum around and also stretch my tailbone all while sitting on this cushion. Bless you!
customer_reviews.author: Retro rules

customer_reviews.title: It stays inflated and my sensory seeking son loved BOTH sides
customer_reviews.text: I am SOOO grateful for this product. It helps my fidgety son sit still while he does his home work work. It stays inflated and my sensory seeking son loved BOTH sides. Ha. No more falling off the chair from the wiggles.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to exercise your core while reading, or watching TV. It has helped me enormously with low back pain. It slips easily under the sofa and is hidden away.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Y Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Use it for restaurants
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my asd 4 year. We take it with us to use in restaurants so that we can enjoy a nice family meal without having to chase our four year old around the restaurant. He seems to be able to settle down a little more with it and it occupies him for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and the kids just love them
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the kids just love them! Great for kiddos that need to work on balance and core strengthening.
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is made of a harder rubber than my first so it is not as soft. Not what I expected but maybe that is what you need. Still a good seat cushion that makes you work your waist more.
customer_reviews.author: mishy

customer_reviews.title: No more ankle sprains...yet
customer_reviews.text: The cushion works great, the pump broke after one use (which is why 4 stars instead of 5). We didn't buy it for the pump though. I removed the needle and was able to reuse that though. We use this for ankle strength as my son likely to make a habit of spraining his ankles. This has either helped tremendously! No sprains since he has been using this daily - just hoping I am not causing another sprain by writing this review!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I went for the cheapest
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I guess. But mine has developed a permanent crease that does not go away if I add air or remove Air from it. And I'm only 106 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: happy purchase for teacher
customer_reviews.text: Children love to sit and stand on these. One side is textured, the other smooth so it's perfect for each preference. We use them for circle time/morning meeting and gross motor activities. The children use them further in other areas in their play as well (dramatic play, block area, etc). Wish they were a little wider so the kids can do cris-cross-applesauce on it more comfortably but that's all! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hiroko

customer_reviews.title: Offers lower back strengthening to prevent back issues
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good quality! I use this ball all the time to help relieve my back. After having a bulging disc about 15 months ago, this ball helps me continue to strengthen my lower back and offers relief. I also use it to sit on the floor rather than sitting on the floor directly, which would cause back pain without this ball.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT pump this up / broken valve
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this, the pump didn't work properly. Very quickly received not only a new pump, but also a full new disk from the company and it worked fine. Wish I hadn't gone through that, but Apple Round made good on their product, and because of that I'm satisfied. Now that it's inflated, the disk works fine, and I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dandeneau

customer_reviews.title: Like it! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I have my Son sit on it at the dinner table to keep the wiggles under control. Otherwise he is standing or moving all over which my husband I sea sick. Yes kids have the wiggles. But this helps when teaching table manners to conform to society. Great for school setting for at the desk and circle time. Gives the ability to move but help the kid sit more still at the same time. Good for core strength as well. Great price. Lists of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It's exactly as described. Very easy to inflate with pump included. Make sure you hold onto something as you step onto it because it could be dangerous. After all, it shifts and kind of rolls when you step onto it but that's what it's meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: just_do_it_28

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was bigger, hard to get two feet on it at once, and mine are only 7-1/2 ladies! My fault, should have paid better attention to measurements. Convenient to have pump, but there is permanent crease in cushion where the pump pushed against it in the box, does not harm anything, just odd.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamonsmom

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far. I need to improve my balance and also strengthen my core and back muscles. There are videos on YouTube that show you some exercises you can do with this. I searched "balance cushion." Little effort required (one of my favorite things).
customer_reviews.author: Linda ScottTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for conditioning my track team. They are durable and can be used in a variety of activities. Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: kristiem

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the suggestion of my chiropractor because I sit for long periods of time and my tailbone bothers me. It seems to help, but since it engages different muscles than I am use to using, I get sore in other places. Overall though, if I use it off and on throughout the day, it is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: NO benefit to your workout.
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller and doesn't create much of unsteadiness to feel any workout on your muscles. I tried my inflation states. It doesn't give the feeling of the workout.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: IT is what it is
customer_reviews.text: No problem with air as some others mention. IT has some advantages.
customer_reviews.author: Te Bada

customer_reviews.title: It works for back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Literally takes the pain away. I have moderate scoliosis and get nerve pain almost everyday this helps me strengthen my core and reminds me how to sit correctly than slouch.
customer_reviews.author: SNMP

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for my ASD child and my daughter that does ballet uses this thing for multiple different uses love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Am

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The color is bright. The fusion comes partially pumped up. The pump that was included was easily used to pump up the fusion a bit more. It is a great wobble/balance cushion for adults or children.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I found this cushion for a great price. My daughters therapist uses one to help her with low muscle tone so I am beyond pleased to have one to work with her. The cushion is easy to inflate and it comes with an extra needle just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my grandson who is on the spectrum and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for my grandson who is on the spectrum and a little ADHD. He settles into his seat like a nest and holds onto the sides because of the tactile stimulation with the smaller nubs. We are also testing the cushion for its usefulness in calming him by placing it under his feet. He rubs his feet back and forth on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. This is my new "chair cushion" - working the abs while on the computer. Order includes cushion, pump, & 2 needles. Excellent customer service! Went to add air to stand on cushion for physical therapy & discovered pump was broken. I emailed Apple Round as indicated in the box & received an immediate response. Very apologetic, sending replacement, & gave me a partial credit for my inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: It's very good, easy to inflate. I'm pregnant and didn't realize the way I was sitting was really affecting me so my chiropractor recommended this and so far so good. I can't sit on it for too long because my butt hurts but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Becca W

customer_reviews.title: It does help with your posture BUT the bumps take ...
customer_reviews.text: It does help with your posture BUT the bumps take some getting used to. I sit at a desk 7 hrs a day and I have to take a break from it just because of the bumps. Wish one side had them and the other side didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Bee

product_meta.title: AppleRound Air Stability Wobble Cushion, Blue, 34cm/13.5in Diameter, Balance Disc, Pump Included
feature_bullets: 13.5in / 34cm in diameter, large spiky dimples on one side (for standing), very small dimples on the reverse side (for sitting).
Free 6-inch hand pump included for easy inflation.
Cushion is delivered deflated. No instructional DVD. Presented in a nice COLOR box.

Instruction: To inflate, the pin from the pump must break through the valve to reach inside of the cushion, or the pin hole would be BLOCKED by the valve wall preventing air to enter. To release the air from the cushion, just insert the pin without the barrel of the pump. Find the valve in the cushion on the 4th outer ring--one spiky dimple is replaced by the valve inside of a small hole.

Seller Warranty: Should pump be faulty or cushion defective, please ‘Contact Seller’ directly (other than Amazon Customer Service) from Amazon Buyer Central against your order for a replacement or refund. Seller aims to provide hassle-free after-sales service and usually replies most emails in 12 hours.
